channel.title: Goldman Sachs on Rob Barry
channel.description: Recent content in Goldman Sachs on Rob Barry

item.title: New Ripples for Gupta Case
item.description: The Galleon Group hedge fund wasn’t alone in piling into Goldman Sachs Group Inc. stock hours before the bank announced a $5 billion investment from Warren Buffett’s firm at the height of the financial crisis, trading records show. Read the full story here.
